item.title: Nepomuk Audio Search
item.description: This is something I showcased at my talk in conf.kde.in. I coded it in a couple of hours. It is a lot of fun to play around with! I can’t wait to index all my videos this way. youtube d41bmTSogA4 Impressive? :D This was showcased at the beginning of the Nepomuk talk under the section “Nepomuk is not about searching, but here are some cool things that it can do!”
